results.title: Modulation of morphine antinociceptive tolerance and physical dependence by co-administration of simvastatin.
results.text_hl: -precipitated withdrawal signs (jumping and @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@body weight loss@@@). Also, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at doses of 100 and 300mg/kg attenuated the expression of @CHEMICAL_Morphine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009020 @@@morphine@@@-induced tolerance and dependence.

citations.NLM: Mansouri MT, Khodayar MJ, Tabatabaee A, Ghorbanzadeh B, Naghizadeh B. Modulation of morphine antinociceptive tolerance and physical dependence by co-administration of simvastatin. Pharmacol Biochem Behav. 2015 Oct;137():38-43. PMID: 26255154

results.title: Simvastatin reduces wasting and improves cardiac function as well as outcome in experimental cancer cachexia.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@ as well as muscle mass and improved cardiac function leading to improved survival in this @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@CC@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Palus S, von Haehling S, Flach VC, Tschirner A, Doehner W, Anker SD, Springer J. Simvastatin reduces wasting and improves cardiac function as well as outcome in experimental cancer cachexia. Int J Cardiol. 2013 Oct 9;168(4):3412-8. PMID: 23680591

results.title: Biochemical changes and morphological alterations of liver and kidney in hamsters after administration of the HMG-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor, simvastatin: prevention and reversibility by mevalonate.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@ fed the standard diet, gastric administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg/day) during 12 days was found to be lethal and to have hepatotoxic and nephrotoxic effects.

citations.NLM: Oms P, Assie N, Bruniquel F, Degryse AD, van Haverbeke G, Delhon A. Biochemical changes and morphological alterations of liver and kidney in hamsters after administration of the HMG-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor, simvastatin: prevention and reversibility by mevalonate. Pharmacol Toxicol. 1995 Dec;77(6):391-6. PMID: 8835365

results.title: Simvastatin treatment restores vasoconstriction and the inhibitory effect of LPC on endothelial relaxation via affecting oxidizing metabolism in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: Plasma @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@ and total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ concentrations were significantly increased in 12-week @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment stopped the @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@, completely normalized the increase of plasma @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ and partially reduced the hyperglycaemia in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ceylan A, Karasu C, Aktan F, Ozansoy G. Simvastatin treatment restores vasoconstriction and the inhibitory effect of LPC on endothelial relaxation via affecting oxidizing metabolism in diabetic rats. Diabetes Nutr Metab. 2004 Aug;17(4):203-10. PMID: 15575340

results.title: Comparative toxicity of high doses of vastatins currently used by clinicians, in CD-1 male mice fed with a hypercholesterolemic diet.
results.text_hl: In the experiment with high doses of VTS + CD, the animals receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVT@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@FVT@@@ showed a moderate @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@.

citations.NLM: Díaz-Zagoya JC, Asenjo-Barrón JC, Cárdenas-Vázquez R, Martínez F, Juárez-Oropeza MA. Comparative toxicity of high doses of vastatins currently used by clinicians, in CD-1 male mice fed with a hypercholesterolemic diet. Life Sci. 1999;65(9):947-56. PMID: 10465354

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor-induced myopathy in the rat: cyclosporine A interaction and mechanism studies.
results.text_hl: Physical signs included inappetence, decreased activity, @<m>DISEASE_Body_Weight</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001835 @@@loss of body weight@@@, localized @DISEASE_Alopecia @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@alopecia@@@ and mortality.
